MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Stoke-On-Trent, affecting properties in Nursery Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:18pm on 16th November 2020.
